Course_Title: Social Justice in Education Capstone Course
Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; For CI 280, only sections with a virtual tutoring component will be eligible.
